mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article( title, description, articleCreateTime, articleUpdateTime, creatorId, readingCount, likeCount, commentCount, tag ) VALUES( #{title}, #{description}, #{articleCreateTime}, #{articleUpdateTime}, #{creatorId}, #{readingCount}, #{likeCount}, #{commentCount}, #{tag} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, description, articleCreateTime, articleUpdateTime, creatorId, readingCount, likeCount, commentCount, tag FROM article
SELECT * FROM article as a,user as u WHERE a.creatorId=u.id
SELECT count(id) FROM article WHERE creatorId=#{creatorId}
SELECT * FROM article as a,user as u WHERE a.creatorId=u.id and a.creatorId=#{id}
SELECT * FROM article as a,user as u WHERE a.creatorId=u.id and a.id=#{id}
SELECT id, title, description, articleCreateTime, articleUpdateTime, creatorId, readingCount, likeCount, commentCount, tag FROM article WHERE id=#{id}
